name: readingtedsshed

skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: reading teds shed
des:
Reading and listening for 1st and 2nd grade- Teds Shed
Alexa will read aloud and you can follow along in your copy of Ted's Shed and you will get questions after each few pages. Test your listening comprehension by remembering facts and details. Answer correctly and achieve a high score.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
